title: Self-managed Niko Price got UFC on ESPN+ 19 spot by surprising Sean Shelby in Las Vegas
text:
TAMPA, Fla. – Niko Price took matters into his own hands to get a spot on the UFC on ESPN+ 19, flying out to Las Vegas to confront matchmakers Sean Shelby and Mick Maynard.

Price (13-3 MMA, 5-3 UFC) a self-managed welterweight who meets James Vick (13-4 MMA, 9-4 UFC) on Saturday, said he surprised the promotional brass at a Dana White’s Contender Series event over the summer and pushed to get a spot on the card, which takes place at Amalie Arena in Tampa and streams on ESPN.

Price has roots in Florida and felt he needed to be on the card to give friends and family a chance to compete in person.

Check out what Price had to saw about fighting at UFC on ESPN+ 19, welcoming Vick to the welterweight division, rebounding from a loss in his previous fight and more, in the video above.
description: Niko Price took matters into his own hands and got himself a fight at UFC Tampa.
